Text.val: This program creates a fax letter
on 1.6.2005 WJ SCR8385 If print is not needed, exit
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
26.07.2012 GB SCR17464 Replaced UFB525 MagicConcat by GB730 AppendFile to build the final XML
27.07.2004 SH SCR6649 Get heller user phone and fax with GB033 now
04.05.2004 SH SCR6144 Defined report for printing if DEBH_FAX
- contains alpha chars (UFB569); see arguments BXA900
04.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
30.01.2004 SH SCR5419 Changed <MAB mab_type="debit"> to <LAS type="debit">
29.01.2004 SH SCR5413 Removed test on SYSAS400 = 'FACTORDE' for update
- on REPA_TAMINOSTYLESHEET
23.01.2004 SH SCR5154 Added new fields where REPA will be stored
14.01.2004 SH SCR5272 Init REPA_AMINOSTYLESHEET = 'LAS' only if
- AS400 <> FACTORDE, else blank
11.12.2003 SH SCR4925 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ENCODING with 0
07.10.2003 SH SCR4476 Replaced HOFF_HADR_CITY by HOFF_CITYONLETTERS
- for tag <administration_city>
17.04.2003 SH SCR3353 Added new tags <administration_city> <client_street>
11.03.2003 SH SCR2566 Added to new arguments for GB007 if job is running on
- AS400 to turn job to message wait
30.10.2002 SH If DEBH_FAX = '' call BXA900 with arguments to print a letter
- instead o fa fax
22.10.2002 SH SCR2393 Add new argument to end of list for call to BXA900
23.09.2002 SCR2229 SH The call to UFB535 " Strip reserved XMLChararters" was
- not correct, we have to call (CALLPROG()) program 1086 instead of 1085.
17.09.2002 SCR2166 SH Add tag <header_id> filled with ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE

14.05.2002 SH SCR95 Wrap any output with UFB535, to replace special XML-Charater
14.05.2002 SH SCR759 Implemented errorhandling and a proper handling of
- directories for Templates and Outputfiles
08.04.2002 SH SCR1059 replaced hardcoded pathnames for the location of the
- templates, used now the pathname from the virtual 'v_dir_template'
07.03.2002 SH SCR952 Set Allow Event to 'N', all tasks
a virtual journal_no for report archive
